Reviews.Title: Superb and Cheap
Reviews.Author: Doofus McNeil "Read Ronin"
Reviews.Content: I live abroad and have a distressing tendency to lose and break telephones. This sub-$100 unlocked gem is a veritable gift from God; it performs MUCH better than similar low-end Samsung products which cost $50 - $100 more. Swift, responsive with a nice display and an extremely simple interface and SD card expansion. I'm on my second one -- the first disappeared in a taxi cab -- and I just love it.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Inch Capacitive Touch Screen,800*480
1*Back camera:3.2MP with Auto Focus
Wifi/GPS/Bluetooth/FM Radio
Suppot 2G:GSM:GSM 900/1800/1900MHz
Suppot  3G:WCDMA:2100MHz
ProductInfo.Name: 4.0-Inch Lenovo A690 Unlocked Smartphone(800*480px) -Dual SIM Dual Standby Android WIFI GPS MTK6575 1.0GHz -Black
